article_title: Equal Pay For Equal Work Seems Like A No-Brainer, Right?

article_metadata.description: On Wednesday, Senate Republicans blocked—for the third time—the Paycheck Fairness Act, a bill proposing to close the pay gap between men and women. The goal of the bill—the attainment of equal pay for equal work—seems like a no-brainer, right? Women with the same job, and same qualifications, as men deserve [...]
article_metadata.author: Peggy Drexler
